author: Amazon Customer

review: This has got to be one of the best things that I've purchased except for my Kindle!  I love the programming available, finally getting to watch some HBO series that I'd always wanted to, starting from season 1, episode 1.  The quality of the picture is spot on and is so easy to take to another room to enjoy the movies or whatever you fancy.  I've cut my UVerse down to the basics and it's hard to believe that I haven't missed that programming at all!I'm so thankful to an Amazon customer service rep that mentioned it to me while I was calling for something else entirely.  For under $100. and a free year of Amazon Prime you've got a fantastic bargain.
author: K. Delucas
